title: Cloak of Arachnida
contents: text | This fine garment is made of black silk interwoven with faint silvery threads. While wearing it, you gain the following benefits:
bullet | You have resistance to poison damage.
bullet | You can't be caught in webs of any sort and can move through webs as if they were difficult terrain.

bullet | You can use an action to cast the web spell (save DC 15). The web created by the spell fills twice its normal area. Once used, this property of the cloak can't be used again until the next dawn.
bullet | You can move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings, while leaving your hands free. Your movment speed is 15 ft.
picture | (E) You have a climbing speed equal to your walking speed.

title: Circlet of Sun
contents: text | This hat has 3 charges. While you wearing it, you can use an action and expend 1 charge to cast folowing spells
text | The hat regains all expended charges daily at dawn.
text | You gain the following monk skill.

property | Blinding Sun Bolt | Immediately after you take the Attack action on your turn, you can spend 1 ki point to perform Blindnig Sun Bolt as a bonus action. This is a special range attack with a range of 30ft. You attempts to blind the creature. It must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of its next turn.

property | Scorching Heart | Immediately after you take the Attack action on your turn, you can spend 1 ki point to use Scorching Heart (with a range of 5ft) as a bonus action. The target must make a Constitution save against your ki save DC. On a failed save, it becomes Immolated, taking 2d6 radiant damage at the end of each of its turns until it or a creature within 5 feet of it uses its action to put it out. The radiant damage increases with your martial die (2d6 becomes 2d8 at 11th level, and so on).
